products.title: Palate Barley Gold Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Amor Yellow Submarine Roller Blind
products.description: Make a statement in your home with the vibrant yellow colour in the amor yellow submarine. This blind is sure to add some zing to your interior and with a name like yellow submarine youll be singing your way round your home before you know it. This is a blackout fabric and is perfect for bedrooms as it will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Andes Machu Gold Roller Blind
products.description: The yellow and gold tones to the andes machu gold make this blind a real showstopper. Perfect for adding colour and style to your window, this print is delicate yet bold with it's intricate print that is best seen close up. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Arrow Head Gold Roller Blind
products.description: Are the arrows facing up or down? Who knows. ? But what we do know is that the stylish colours in the arrow head gold make this a great blind to install in windows across your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Aztec Golden Temple Roller Blind
products.description: The triangular pattern that adornes this blind is unique, geometric and a great way to add colour into your home. Use this blind across your bedroom, living room and bathroom to get the full impact of this design. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Leafy Golden Spring Roller Blind
products.description: The repeating yellow toned leaf print is both delicate and geometric, and in the lighter hue, it is a perfect way of adding a layer of character and pattern to your home, whilst also keeping it subtle and refined in your window. Choose a dimout or blackout fabric for this blind to make it perfect for your room and window setting. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Crown Burgundy Gold Roller Blind
products.description: With is unique print, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the uniqe print on the front of this blind, you can add a touch of style and class to your windows. Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light. Crown burgundy gold roller blind.

products.description: With is unique print, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the uniqe print on the front of this blind, you can add a touch of style and class to your windows. Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light. Crown teal gold roller blind.
